properties.name: embedding.enabled
properties.description: Enable or disable the DJL text embedding auto-configuration.

properties.name: embedding.prefer-local-models
properties.description: Prefer local filesystem models when paths are configured.

properties.name: embedding.text-model-path
properties.description: Filesystem path to the text embedding model.

properties.name: embedding.multimodal-model-path
properties.description: Filesystem path to the multimodal text embedding model.

properties.name: embedding.text-model-url
properties.description: Remote identifier or URL for the text embedding model.

properties.name: embedding.multimodal-model-url
properties.description: Remote identifier or URL for the multimodal embedding model.

properties.name: embedding.fail-on-missing-model
properties.description: Fail application startup when no embedding model can be loaded.

properties.name: embedding.embedding-dimension
properties.description: Expected embedding dimension for diagnostic logging.

properties.name: embedding.pooling-mode
properties.description: Pooling strategy for the DJL text translator.

properties.name: embedding.normalize-outputs
properties.description: Normalise embedding vectors produced by DJL translator.

properties.name: embedding.engine
properties.description: Engine name supplied to DJL when loading models.
